Trade/Device Name(s): ADVOCATE® Redi-Code* BMB-EA001S Blood Glucose Monitoring System
ADVOCATE® Redi-Code* BMB-EA004S Blood Glucose meter
ADVOCATE® Redi-Code* BMB-BA006A Blood Glucose test strips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ADVOCATE® Redi-Code* BMB-EA004S Blood Glucose meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ADVOCATE® Redi-Code* BMB-EA001S Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood for at-home diabetes monitoring.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood at home from various sites, as an aid in monitoring effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis or neonatal testing, for single-person use only.
